pages.title: Timber Rattlesnake
pages.text: The timber rattlesnake, canebrake rattlesnake, or banded rattlesnake ($(o)Crotalus horridus$()) is a species of venomous, sometimes highly venomous, pit viper endemic to eastern North America.$(br2)No subspecies are currently recognized.

pages.title: Timber Rattlesnake
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
